archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0135
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want to create a set of rules for when a customer needs to be credit checked in order to purchase a device on interest free, so that I can reduce bad debt

properties.value: Could you explain what type of rules would you like to create? In general rules are configured by Comarch team. A sample rule could be: if we've checked you in last x days and you are a customer with a good repayment history (not involved in collections process)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
